description: Turkish style eggs menemen combines sweet capsicums with baked eggs for a delicious and spicy breakfast or brunch.
keywords: Baked eggs,Pescatarian,Seafood free,Gluten free,Tree nut free,Egg,Sesame free,Halal,Soy free,Wheat free,Vegetarian,Tomato,Peanut free
name: Turkish Style Eggs & Capsicums Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 2 medium red onions, peeled and sliced
2 medium capsicums, red, cored and sliced

recipeInstructions.text: Heat the oil in a large non-stick pan on medium heat and cook the onions for 5 minutes. Add the capsicums and chilli and cook for 5 minutes.
Pour over the chopped tomatoes and simmer for 8-10 minutes, until reduced. Make 4 well in the sauce and crack in the eggs. Cook for 3-4 minutes on low heat, covered, until just set.
Sprinkle over fresh coriander, crumbled feta and cracked black pepper and serve with bread for scooping, if desired.
